¡Hola! Soy Elizabeth.

This is where your bio goes. Did you know only 7% of job seekers have a website when 56% of hiring managers say that a website is the most impressive personal branding tool about a candidate? More than 70% of recruiters have admitted to finding candidates through websites. 37% of employers have used social media and internet resources to screen candidates. I know how stressful it was for me finding a job so I wanted to make the process a little bit easier for you.

I hope you don't think I want you to come to America is because of inappropriate reasons. Travelling is one of my favorite things to do and I would love to share those experiences with you. New York is quite beautiful in the winter :)

Hopefully this aids you in your job search!

I love you <3

Pagination Post

Here we see Tale’s pagination feature in action. It is set to 5 posts per page by default. Feel free to change this number in the _config.yml file!
